TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicValidatorEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 包含事件数据的 类的基类。

span.span: Base class for classes that contain event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从数据模型中的 LINQ to SQL 类或实体框架方法中捕获引发的异常。The class catches exceptions thrown from LINQ to SQL classes or from Entity Framework methods in a data model. 此类不包含事件数据。This class does not contain event data. 当引发事件时，它由未将状态信息传递给事件处理程序的事件使用。It is used by events that do not pass state information to an event handler when an event is raised. 如果事件处理程序需要状态信息，则必须从此类创建派生类来保存数据。If the event handler requires state information, you must create a derived class from this class to hold the data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Exception exception, valuetype System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataSourceOperation operation) cil managed
Public Sub New (exception As Exception, operation As DynamicDataSourceOperation)

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: operation
param.span: 引发异常的数据源操作。

span.span: The data source operation that caused the exception.

summary.span: 使用发生的异常和引发异常的数据源操作初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the exception that occurred and the data source operation that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据提供可由数据源对象执行的数据源操作。ASP.NET Dynamic Data provides data source operations that can be performed by a data source object. 这些操作包括 `Delete` 、 `Insert` 、 `Select` 和 `Update` `ContextCreate` 。These operations include `Delete`, `Insert`, `Select` and `Update` and `ContextCreate`. 如果在数据源操作过程中发生异常，则导致该异常的数据源操作和发生的异常分别由和表示 。If an exception occurs during a data source operation, the data source operation that caused the exception and the exception that occurred are represented by and respectively. 此构造函数 使用这些属性初始化类的新实例。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class using these properties.

public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取在数据源操作事件期间发生的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that occurs during a data source operation event.

value.span: 在数据源操作事件期间发生的异常。

span.span: The exception that occurred during the data source operation event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据提供可由数据源对象执行的数据源操作。ASP.NET Dynamic Data provides data source operations that can be performed by a data source object. 这些操作包括 `Delete` 、 `Insert` 、 `Select` 和 `Update` `ContextCreate` 。These operations include `Delete`, `Insert`, `Select` and `Update` and `ContextCreate`. 如果发生异常，则 类将使用此属性来获取数据源操作期间触发的异常的类型。If an exception occurs, the class uses this property to get the type of exception that is triggered during a data source operation.

summary.span: 获取在 类中引发异常的数据源操作。

span.span: Gets the data source operation that caused an exception in the class.

value.span: 引发异常的数据源操作。

span.span: The data source operation that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据提供可由数据源对象执行的数据源操作。ASP.NET Dynamic Data provides data source operation that can be performed by the data source object. 这些操作包括 `Delete` 、 `Insert` 、 `Select` 和 `Update` `ContextCreate` 。These operations include `Delete`, `Insert`, `Select` and `Update` and `ContextCreate`. 如果发生异常，类将 使用此属性来检索触发该异常的操作。If an exception occurs, the class uses this property to retrieve the operation that triggered that exception.
